# iru_library_item_activity (Data Source)

Get activity for a specific library item.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iru_library_item_activity" "example" {
  library_item_id = "your-library-item-uuid"
}

output "item_activity" {
  value = data.iru_library_item_activity.example.activity
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `library_item_id` (String) The unique identifier for the Library Item.

### Read-Only

- `activity` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--activity))

<a id="nestedatt--activity"></a>
### Nested Schema for `activity`

Read-Only:

- `activity_time` (String)
- `device_id` (String)
- `device_name` (String)
- `status` (String)
